docs.lead_paragraph: The park lawns are developing apparently a new product since nature has begun to take on a vernal hue -- Italian women who are searching for the hygienic dandelion. They find it in goodly numbers. The green dandelion salad is a favorite among the Italians, and its-bitterness makes it an excellent appetizer with meats.
